[[2000-01 Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu season|2000-01]] |} [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] (MÄ°Y) participated in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] [[1999â00 Turkish Second Football League|1999â00]] season for the 26th time. MÄ°Y couldn't attend promotion group and promotion play-offs, therefore couldn't promote. The team also participated in [[TÃ¼rkiye KupasÄ±]] (Turkey Cup) in [[1999â00 TÃ¼rkiye KupasÄ±|1999â00]] and eliminated at Round 3. ==League Participation== [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] took place in Group 1 in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] [[1998â99 Turkish Second Football League|1998â99]] season. League played in three stages again. In the first stage 50 teams in five groups (10 clubs in each) played for first two rankings to play in promotion group. Promotion group was consisted of those 10 teams. At the end of the second stage top two teams promoted to [[Turkish First Football League|First League]] [[2000â01 Turkish First Football League|2000â01]]. Remaining 8 teams in each ranking group played in classification groups, by carrying points and goals from ranking groups. Bottom two teams in Groups 2, 4, 5 relegated to [[Turkish Third Football League|Third League]] [[Turkish Third Football League 2000-01|2000-01]] at the end of the season. Due to [[1999 Ä°zmit earthquake|earthquake]] occurred on August 17, 1999, [[Sakaryaspor]] and [[DÃ¼zcespor]] in Group 1 and [[DarÄ±ca GenÃ§lerbirliÄi]] in Group 3 withdrawed from the league and demanded excuse. [[Turkish Football Federation|TFF]] has decided that the teams would not be relegated. One another worst team from Group 1 and two another worst teams in Group 3 had relegated at the end of the season. In the third stage, 8 clubs (3 from the promotion group and 1 each from 5 classification groups) played one-leg play-off games in [[Antalya AtatÃ¼rk Stadium|Antalya]] to determine the third team to be promoted to First League[http://www.angelfire.com/nj/sivritepe/9900/CP2L.html Cem Pekin Archives] (30 March 2010).. [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] took place in Group 1 consisted of 8 teams and finished first stage at 7th place and couldn't took place in promotion group. In classification group, team finished 6th and couldn't attend to promotion play-off games. The team didn't relegate by 1 point increment. ==Turkish Cup Participation== [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] had participated in [[TÃ¼rkiye KupasÄ±]] (Turkey Cup) in [[1999â00 TÃ¼rkiye KupasÄ±|1999â00]] and eliminated at 3rd RoundSelect 1999-00 season fixtures at TFF team page [http://www.tff.org/Default.aspx?pageId=535&kulupID=118 game details at TFF page].. MÄ°Y attended to the cup starting from second round.
